mapper.sql: course_id, coach_id, club_id, reg_date, KT_CNT, XT_CNT, bz1, bz2, reg_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_income_dtl where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reg_date like CONCAT('%',#{regDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into t_income_dtl

coach_id,

reg_date,

XT_CNT,

bz2,

mapper.update:
update t_income_dtl
coach_id=#{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
club_id=#{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kt_cnt=#{ktCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
xt_cnt= #{xtCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bz1= #{bz1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bz2=#{bz2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time=#{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where
course_id= #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and reg_date =#{regDate,jdbcType=DATE}
